Source code for services.web_ui.models.plasmoid

'''
.. moduleauthor:: OS-Networks <info@os-networks.net>
'''

import uuid
from django.db import models
from django import forms
from django.forms import ModelForm
from datetime import datetime
import re

from web_ui.models.profiles import Profile

def make_uuid():
    return str(uuid.uuid4())


[docs]class Plasmoid(models.Model):
    connection_name="default"
    uuid = models.CharField(max_length=36,  primary_key=True, default=make_uuid)
    slug = models.SlugField(editable=False, blank=True, max_length=30)
    script = models.TextField()
    type = models.IntegerField()
    target = models.CharField(max_length=128)
    visible = models.IntegerField()
    last_modified = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
    
    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = "Plasmoids"
        db_table = 'hwios_plasmoids'
        
        


[docs]class Plasmoids(object):
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.get_routes()
    
    

[docs]    def route(self, view_history, profile):
        plasmoids = []
        for route in self.routes:
            match = False
            rp1 = route[0].match(view_history[-1])
            #match
            if rp1 != None:
                if len(view_history) >=2:
                    rp2 = route[0].match(view_history[-2])
                    if rp2 == None:
                        match = True
                else: match = True
            if match:
                if route[1].visible == 0:
                    plasmoids.append({
                        'uuid':route[1].uuid,
                        'slug':route[1].slug,
                        'type':route[1].type,
                        'script':route[1].script,
                    })
                elif route[1].visible == 1 and profile.is_authenticated:
                    plasmoids.append({
                        'uuid':route[1].uuid,
                        'slug':route[1].slug,
                        'type':route[1].type,
                        'script':route[1].script,
                    })
                elif route[1].visible == 2 and profile.is_staff:
                    plasmoids.append({
                        'uuid':route[1].uuid,
                        'slug':route[1].slug,
                        'type':route[1].type,
                        'script':route[1].script,
                    })
        if len(plasmoids) == 0:
            return None
        else:
            return plasmoids
            
            

    def get_routes(self):
        self.routes = []
        plasmoids = Plasmoid.objects.all()
        for plasmoid in plasmoids:
            self.routes.append([re.compile(plasmoid.target),plasmoid])
